text: This home is truly one of the most impressive lifestyle properties available. It is prestigiously situated at the top of an elevated cul-de-sac in one of El Segundo's most desirable neighborhoods. Offering breathtaking ocean, city, and mountain views, this residence is set on one of the largest lots in El Segundo. This well-cared for home features five bedrooms, five bathrooms, multiple interior and exterior living spaces, and desirable updates. With over 4, 000 square feet of living space on a quarter acre of land, this property is an irreplaceable oasis. ~ The traditional floor plan is open and enjoyable, seamlessly connecting with the land on which it sits. The main floor includes a welcoming entry, spacious front living room, designated dining room, open kitchen for cooking enthusiasts, versatile sunken den, indoor/outdoor full bathroom, comfortable family room complete with a wood-burning fireplace, and sizable eating area featuring an entertaining wet bar. The updated kitchen boasts a large central island with barstool seating, secondary prep island and sink, soapstone countertops, task lighting, and luxury appliances. Recessed lighting, brick fireplace, built-in shelving, and numerous windows and glass exterior doors enhance the living areas, blending comfort with activity. ~ On the second level, youll find a grand primary suite, two large bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms (one of which can be divided into two bedrooms), an additional well-appointed third bedroom, full hall bath, organized laundry closet, and a panoramic family room that captures stunning ocean, city, and mountain views. The family room opens through French doors to deck space and an exterior staircase leading to the backyard. ~ The backyard is functionally designed with three tiers. The first tier features an inground spa, water feature, and a heated pool with retractable cover. The second tier offers an expansive grass lawn perfect for play or gardening. The possibilities on the third tier are endlessconsider options for an ADU, built-in BBQ area, enclosed batting cages, or sports court. ~ This ideally located property is just a few blocks from Richmond Street Elementary School, El Segundo High School, and the vibrant dining and shopping areas in Downtown El Segundo. Welcome to dream living. Welcome to the impressive lifestyle of 727 W Mariposa!

The lovely archways and coved ceilings have kept the historical details of the house while adding style and warmth. The dining area is perfect for easy Sunday dinners to formal holiday feasts. The open concept remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops will be a space of enjoyment for any home chef! The 3 bedrooms are wonderfully laid out and of a good size. Two bedrooms are perfect for a home office, guest room or nursery. Step down into the master suite where vaulted ceilings and beautiful patterned tile lead the way to French doors that open into the backyard retreat. The master bath with dual sinks and large walk-in shower is a dream. The newly landscaped backyard is an outdoor oasis complete with paver patio, pergola, gas firepit, and lush native landscaping to enjoy the sea breeze. The oversized 2 car garage is perfect for keeping your vehicles AND beach toys. Additional storage in the walk-up attic provides endless possibilities - from playroom to guest house/ADU. All of this in walking distance of award-winning schools, shops, restaurants, and our beautiful local beaches.

Kitchen opens to the living room with a beautiful statement white brick fireplace and skylights for lots of natural lighting. Great sized master bedroom with gorgeous spa like master bath complete with shiplap, large walk-in shower, and dual vanities. Three additional bedrooms, two full baths, laundry space, and mud room with shiplap round out the spacious floor plan. The beautifully landscaped fenced in turf grass front yard has plenty of room for kids to play as well as a good-sized backyard and covered patio space for outdoor entertaining. 2 car attached garage with ample room for storage and fully insulated to be a second living or game room. Just a few short blocks to Main Street for trendy restaurants, shops, cafes, art galleries, and convenient access to freeways/LAX.

text: Turnkey and beautifully upgraded two bedroom two bathroom condo located in the heart of El Segundo and across from the beautiful Library Park. This single story condo boasts an open living room and an updated kitchen with hand selected finishes and many tasteful upgrades to create a modern and sophisticated atmosphere. The living room is bright, spacious and opens up to your private patio that is set up for grilling (already set up for a gas bbq). The kitchen features white shaker cabinets with soft close hinges, quartz counter-tops, custom shelving, recessed lighting, modern hardware and Samsung appliances. The condo has recently been painted, has newly installed modern baseboards, new custom barn doors, new waterproof vinyl flooring and a brand new water heater. It also boasts central HVAC, custom surround sound system and heated floors (guest bathroom) and heated towel racks (both bathrooms). The spacious master bedroom has a newly updated ensuite bathroom, walk in close with built-ins, separate linen close and a second entrance to the patio. The complex offers a picnic area, pool, spa, elevator access, bike storage, individual unit storage and 2 side by side parking spaces in a gated an secure parking garage. Beyond all the upgrades the best part about this condo is the location. El Segundo is an amazing town with great restaurants, bars and coffee shops that are just a short walk away! Being across from the Library Park is such a great perk (Summer concerts are such a treat!) and just a beautiful space to enjoy all years long. Less than 10 minutes from Manhattan Beach, Playa del Rey and an easy commute into Silicon Beach and Santa Monica. Don't forget the award winning schools, amazing city amenities (parks, tennis courts, weekly Farmer's Market, 4th of July event) and being walking distance to the beautiful South Bay Beaches!

It has an open floor plan, and consists of 5 Beds, 5 Baths with ocean views, vaulted ceilings, engineered wood flooring, recessed lighting, natural stone flooring, large Pella vinyl lifetime windows, richly crafted finishes & high-end upgrades throughout. The grand entrance meets the foyer to the dining area and opens to the stylish chef's kitchen, flooded with natural light. Top-of-theline Miele kitchen appliances, pot filler faucet above the 8-burner stove, two ovens, built-in automatic coffee maker, a prep sink, custom white cabinets, extra-large island with granite countertops, and a white backsplash. There is a spacious family room that features a wall-mounted stone fireplace and large floor-to-ceiling panoramic doors that reveal this home's incredible indoor/outdoor experience. The top floor is where you will find the primary suite, which features a beautiful custom walk-in closet and a large master bath with 2 separate vanities, a walk-in shower, and a large clawfoot bath. Downstairs, you'll find two bedrooms, providing flexibility to host both guests and a home office, the laundry room, and the second primary suite which also features a stone fireplace, walk-in closet, and a full bath. This home also includes a mother-in-law quarter with its own separate entrance that features beautiful stone flooring, a full kitchen with stainless steel appliances and avalanche countertops, and a full bed and bath. The luxurious outdoor veranda features a lounge area with a sink, a refrigerator, and built-in heaters. Below the veranda is a large patio that is plumbed and ready to build for an outdoor kitchen if the Buyer opts to build one. The amenities do not stop here. There is a speaker system throughout except for the mother-in-law quarter, three-zone central air- conditioning, 16 exterior security cameras, 3-car garage, automatic gated driveway, irrigation system, two water heaters, and a ton of attic space for storage. This home has it all!
